name: Particle Overdrive
desc_en:
# ParticleOverdrive

This mod focuses on tweaking the amount of effects particles in the game.

To configure particles, navigate to the options, and then the mod settings tab. This is where all of ParticleOverdrive's options are located.

ParticleOverdrive allows you to configure the following:
- Disable [camera noise](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Image_noise)
- Disable the white dust particles that float around the player
- Modify the amount of particles created from cutting notes - known as note cut and note explosion particles
- Modify the amount of particles caused by the sabers colliding with eachother
- Modify the amount of particles caused by the sabers colliding with wall obstacles

After changing any settings, make sure to press "OK", ensuring that the changes get saved.
